exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0%nat Hp' : prime p Hp'' : (2 <= p)%nat Hzero_one : Zp <> Op H : forall x, prime p -> x ⊗ x = Op -> x = Op \\/ x = ∸ Op Unable to unify "?M1459 = Op \\/ ?M1459 = ∸ Op" with "〚 fact (p - 1) 〛 = ∸ Op".
Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: apply Zp_prime_square_one. - auto. - rewrite Zp_prime_invert. + exists Zp. symmetry. apply Zp_invert_spec2. intros H. apply Zp_prime_invert with (x := 〚 fact (p - 1) 〛). * auto. * rewrite H. apply Zp_invertible_prime. auto.
